Protected types¶

t_vvc_info_list¶

Protected type to gather VVC’s info in a list.

add(name, instance, [channel], [cmd_idx])

Object

Name

Dir.

Type

Description

constant

name

in

string

VVC’s name defined in vvc_methods_pkg as C_VVC_NAME

constant

instance

in

integer

Instance number of the VVC

constant

channel

in

t_channel

The VVC channel of the VVC instance

constant

cmd_idx

in

integer

The index to be awaited

 
-- Examples:
variable v_vvc_info_list : t_vvc_info_list;
v_vvc_info_list.add("SBI_VVC", 1);
v_vvc_info_list.add("AXISTREAM_VVC", 3, v_cmd_idx);
v_vvc_info_list.add("UART_VVC", ALL_INSTANCES, ALL_CHANNELS);
